scripts.clean-app: rm -rf dist/app && mkdir -p dist/app && cp -r fluid dist/app && cp web/index.html dist/app && cp -r web/css dist/app && cp -r web/pdf dist/app
scripts.build-app: yarn clean-app && spago build --purs-args '--strict --censor-codes=UserDefinedWarning' && purs-backend-es bundle-app --main App --to dist/app/app.js
scripts.clean-artifact: rm -rf dist/artifact && mkdir -p dist/artifact && cp -r fluid dist/artifact && cp web/artifact.html dist/artifact/index.html && cp -r web/css dist/artifact
scripts.build-artifact: yarn clean-artifact && spago build --purs-args '--strict --censor-codes=UserDefinedWarning' && purs-backend-es bundle-app --main Artifact --to dist/artifact/app.js
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist/tests && mkdir -p dist/tests && cp web/tests.html dist/tests
scripts.clean-bench: rm -rf dist/benches && mkdir -p dist/benches && cp -r fluid dist/benches && cp web/index.html dist/benches && cp -r web/css dist/benches
scripts.build: yarn tidy && yarn clean && spago build --purs-args '--strict --censor-codes=UserDefinedWarning' && purs-backend-es bundle-app --main Test.Test --to dist/tests/app.js
scripts.build-bench: yarn clean-bench && spago build --purs-args '--strict --censor-codes=UserDefinedWarning' && purs-backend-es bundle-app --main Test.Benchmark --to dist/benches/app.js
scripts.tidy: yarn purs-tidy format-in-place src/*.purs src/App/**/*.purs src/**/*.purs test/*.purs test/**/*.purs
scripts.build-puppeteer: yarn tidy && yarn clean && spago build --purs-args '--strict --censor-codes=UserDefinedWarning' && purs-backend-es bundle-app --platform=node --main Test.Puppeteer --to dist/tests/puppeteer.js
